body:
I would like to contribute a new package to SPACK called ELSI.

[ELSI](https://wordpress.elsi-interchange.org/) provides a unified interface for electronic structure codes to a variety of eigenvalue solvers. Since ELSI is a wrapper, SPACK makes it much easier to use by installing its many dependencies.

For a number of different options, I ended up using a pattern:
` if '+enable_myoption' in self.spec:
     args += ["-DENABLE_MYOPTION=ON"]`
in order to translate options to CMake arguments. If there is an automatic way to do this, please let me know and I will make the change.
title: New Package: ELSI
